cat.lump.ir.sim.cl.len

Class LengthModelEstimate

  • java.lang.Object
    • cat.lump.ir.sim.cl.len.LengthModelEstimate

  • public class LengthModelEstimate
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to estimate the length factor between two texts according to previously learnt parameters.
    Version:
    0.3
    Author:
    albarron
    See Also:
    cat.talp.lump.sim.lenMod.LengthModel

      • estimateMatrix

        public double[][] estimateMatrix()
        Estimates the length factors of the sentences among them.
        Returns:
        A matrix of length factors. Each row is a source sentence and each column a target one.

      • setVerbose

public void setVerbose(java.lang.Boolean verb)

        Whether the output should include source and target texts or only the length factor.
        Use either displayVerbose() or display() instead
